Uses of Interface
nl.han.ica.oopg.userinput.IKeyInput

Packages that use IKeyInput
Package Description
IntoTheGalaxy  
nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard  
nl.han.ica.oopg.objects  
nl.han.ica.oopg.pgraphicsstub  

  • Uses of IKeyInput in IntoTheGalaxy

    Classes in IntoTheGalaxy that implement IKeyInput
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Alien
    Abstract class to create an Alien.
    class  AlienRocket
    A Rocket that moves down the screen and can hit Fighter.
    class  Bee
    A type of alien that looks like a bee.
    class  Boss
    A type of alien that resembles a big bird.
    class  Butterfly
    A type of alien that looks like a butterfly.
    class  Button
    An abstract class to create a button that can interact with the world when you click on it.
    class  Fighter
    A spaceship that can be controlled with the WASD keys and shoot Alien with the E key, can be hit by Alien and AlienRocket and loses a life, deleted from world if 3 lives are gone.
    class  FighterRocket
    A Rocket that moves up the screen and can hit Alien
    class  RestartButton
    A button that you can click to delete the endscreen and create the startscreen.
    class  Rocket
    An abstract class to create rockets.
    class  StartButton
    A button that you can click to delete the startscreen and create the gamescreen.
    class  TextObject
    Creates a text object, with the text, fontSize and color (grayscale) and the x and y in the center.

  • Uses of IKeyInput in nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard

    Classes in nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard that implement IKeyInput
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Dashboard
    Create or extend this class to create a new dashboard, a dashboard object will be drawn above the ViewPort when added to the dashboard list inside the GameEngine (addDashboard).
    class  FPSCounter
    The FPSCounter is used by the GameEngine and shows the Frames Per Second on the screen.

  • Uses of IKeyInput in nl.han.ica.oopg.objects

    Classes in nl.han.ica.oopg.objects that implement IKeyInput
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AnimatedSpriteObject
    The AnimatedSpriteObject is an extension of SpriteObject.
    class  GameObject
    Make your object, extend this class to use your object as a drawable object.
    class  GameObjectTest.FakeGameObject  
    class  SpriteObject
    The SpriteObject is a extension of GameObject.
    class  TextObject
    Use this class to draw text.
